description: This file defines a centralized theme and style configuration for a Flutter application. It includes color palettes, theme data, text styles, component styles, and motion parameters tailored for a luxury Black & Gold aesthetic, emphasizing dark surfaces, gold accents, and subtle blue highlights.

classes.name: _AppMotionTheme
classes.description: A ThemeExtension that encapsulates motion durations and animation curve for the app, allowing consistent transition timings throughout the UI.

methods.name: get lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the dark scheme, gold accents, and custom styles suitable for the app's luxury Black & Gold aesthetic.
